Spells:
Cure Light Wounds (Healing Hex1 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 1d8+5 HP (DC 11 Will half)
Cure Moderate Wounds (Healing Hex2 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 2d8+10 HP (DC 13 Will half)
Fire Storm (Witch8 Evoc): R300' 40 10' cu inflicts 20d6 HP, then 4d6 HP/rd until extinguished (DC 19 Ref half, initial damage only)
Fireball (Witch3 Evoc): R1200' Inflicts 10d6 HP (DC 14 Ref half) in 20' radius
Flame Strike (Witch5 Evoc): R300' 10' radius x 40' high inflicts 15d6 HP (DC 16 Ref half)
Flaming Sphere (Witch2 Evoc): R300' 5' diameter sphere inflicts 3d6 HP (DC 13 Ref neg), jumps or moves 30'/rd for 20 rd
Freezing Sphere (Witch6 Evoc): R1200' 40' radius inflicts 15d6 HP (DC 17 Ref half)
Meteor Swarm (Witch9 Evoc): R1200' 4 spheres inflict 6d6 HP fire in 40' radius (DC 20 Ref half), ranged touch +2d6 HP bludgeoning
Nightmare (Nightmares Hex5 Illu): Target suffers 1d10 HP and fatigue (DC 21 Will neg (modified for familiarity w/target))
Shocking Grasp (Witch1 Evoc): Touch (+3 vs. metal) inflicts 5d6 HP
Sleep (Slumber Hex1 Ench): R300' 4 HD of creatures in 10' radius sleep (DC 11 Will neg) for 20 min
Vortex (Witch7 Evoc): R1200' 15' radius inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning (DC 18 Ref neg) on first contact, then 1d8 HP/rd on Medium and smaller (DC 18 Ref neg) for 19 rd; self may eject creatures from vortex
Wall Of Ice (Witch4 Evoc): R300' Creates 20 10' x 20 inch thick ice wall or 23' hemisphere for 20 min
Magic Notes:
Intelligence Witch Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Witch1
Agony Hex: R60' Target suffers nauseated for 20 rd (DC 21 Fort ends) 1/target/dy
Blight Hex: Touch kills vegetation in 200' radius over 1 wk or inflicts -1 Constitution/dy
Brew Potion: May create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Cantrips: May cast 0-level spells
Coven Hex: R30' May use aid another to give target w/Coven Hex +1 caster level for 1 rd
Craft Staff: May create magic staves
Death Curse Hex: R30' Target becomes fatigued (DC 21 Will neg), then exhausted, then dies (DC 21 Fort suffers 4d6+20 HP) 1/target/dy
Ectoplasmic Spell: May spend +1 spell slot to target an incorporeal or ethereal creature
Eternal Slumber Hex: Touch or poison inflicts permanent sleep (DC 21 Will neg) 1/target/dy
Healing Hex: May use Cure Moderate Wounds effects 1/target/dy
Misfortune Hex: R30' Target suffers worse of 2 rolls on all ability checks, attack, saves, and skill checks (DC 21 Will neg) for 3 rd 1/target/dy
Nightmares Hex: R60' May use Nightmare effects (DC 21 Will ends)
Patron: Knows additional spells
Retribution Hex: R60' Target suffers half of damage it inflicts (DC 21 Will neg) for 1 rd
Scribe Scroll: May create scroll of any known spell
Slumber Hex: R30' May use Sleep effects w/out HD limit (DC 21 Will neg) for 20 rd 1/target/dy
Witch's Familiar: Familiar stores spells
